recommendations: Alyssa Dennis ‚ÄúVaishnavi is a product manager powerhouse. Her ability to take a nebulous idea and almost instantly create tangible product feature is unmatched. She also manages many disparate individuals on a team with ease, making sure everyone is fully aware of each deadline and communicating with the team as a whole. I am so thankful I get to work with Vaishnavi, as she makes any product she works on that much better!‚Äù
